Quotes.Health Quotes: Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence, so that's very important for good health.
Quotes.Author: Dalai Lama

Quotes.Health Quotes: To enjoy good health, to bring true happiness to one's family, to bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one's own mind. If a man can control his mind he can find the way to Enlightenment, and all wisdom and virtue will naturally come to him.
Quotes.Author: Buddha

Quotes.Health Quotes: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
Quotes.Author: Gene Tunney

Quotes.Health Quotes: Good health and good sense are two of life's greatest blessings.
Quotes.Author: Publilius Syrus

Quotes.Health Quotes: To keep the body in good health is a duty... otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
Quotes.Author: Buddha

Quotes.Health Quotes: Happiness is nothing more than good health and a bad memory.
Quotes.Author: Albert Schweitzer

Quotes.Health Quotes: All the money in the world can't buy you back good health.
Quotes.Author: Reba McEntire

Quotes.Health Quotes: Our greatest happiness does not depend on the condition of life in which chance has placed us, but is always the result of a good conscience, good health, occupation, and freedom in all just pursuits.
Quotes.Author: Thomas Jefferson

Quotes.Health Quotes: Good health is not something we can buy. However, it can be an extremely valuable savings account.
Quotes.Author: Anne Wilson Schaef

Quotes.Health Quotes: Maintaining good health should be the primary focus of everyone.
Quotes.Author: Sangram Singh

Quotes.Health Quotes: The foundation of success in life is good health: that is the substratum fortune; it is also the basis of happiness. A person cannot accumulate a fortune very well when he is sick.
Quotes.Author: P. T. Barnum

Quotes.Health Quotes: There's nothing more important than our good health - that's our principal capital asset.
Quotes.Author: Arlen Specter

Quotes.Health Quotes: Apart from education, you need good health, and for that, you need to play sports.
Quotes.Author: Kapil Dev

Quotes.Health Quotes: Without your health, you've got nothing going on. I thank God every day for good health.
Quotes.Author: Ric Flair

Quotes.Health Quotes: But the real secret to lifelong good health is actually the opposite: Let your body take care of you.
Quotes.Author: Deepak Chopra

Quotes.Health Quotes: In the midst of these hard times it is our good health and good sleep that are enjoyable.
Quotes.Author: Knute Nelson

Quotes.Health Quotes: You can't take good health for granted.
Quotes.Author: Jack Osbourne

Quotes.Health Quotes: Love is not as important as good health. You cannot be in love if you're not healthy. You can't appreciate it.
Quotes.Author: Bryan Cranston

Quotes.Health Quotes: When you feel great, you emanate a certain energy that translates as beautiful. I don't care if you have the standard beauty or not; it's that X-factor that comes through, and the basis of that is good health.
Quotes.Author: Christie Brinkley

Quotes.Health Quotes: You don't have to be a wreck. You don't have to be sick. One's aim in life should be to die in good health. Just like a candle that burns out.
Quotes.Author: Jeanne Moreau

Quotes.Health Quotes: o be stupid and selfish and to have good health are the three requirements for happiness. Though if stupidity is lacking, the others are useless.
Quotes.Author: Stefan Sagmeister

Quotes.Health Quotes: I find that if I don't have enough physical activity in life, I don't do as well with anything else in my life. It's stress relief; it's good health. It's fun. It's alone time, for the most part.
Quotes.Author: Betsy Hodges

Quotes.Health Quotes: If you are able to see the interrelatedness of mind and body, sensitivity towards your body becomes much sharper. Therefore, maintaining of good health also becomes easier.
Quotes.Author: Lobsang Tenzin

Quotes.Health Quotes: Whole Foods has a good health care plan.
Quotes.Author: John Mackey

Quotes.Health Quotes: Reducing dietary salt is not only important for those who already have elevated blood pressure - limiting added salt is essential for all of us to remain in good health.
Quotes.Author: Joel Fuhrman

Quotes.Health Quotes: As one ages, eventually, no matter what regime you've followed, no matter how fiercely you've fought the fight, good health becomes harder to maintain. It may disappear overnight or simply dwindle, but with every year that passes, the odds shorten.
Quotes.Author: Laurie Graham

Quotes.Health Quotes: After a lifetime of losing and gaining weight, I get it. No matter how you slice it, weight loss comes down to the simple formula of calories in, calories out.
Quotes.Author: Valerie Bertinelli

Quotes.Health Quotes: Many of depression's symptoms - exhaustion, insomnia, nausea, headaches, weight loss, weight gain - are physical ailments.
Quotes.Author: Gayle Forman

Quotes.Health Quotes: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
Quotes.Author: Buddha

Quotes.Health Quotes: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you.
Quotes.Author: Joyce Meyer

Quotes.Health Quotes: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
Quotes.Author: Gene Tunney

Quotes.Health Quotes: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
Quotes.Author: Mahatma Gandhi

Quotes.Health Quotes: To keep the body in good health is a duty... otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
Quotes.Author: Buddha

Quotes.Health Quotes: Health is not valued till sickness comes.
Quotes.Author: Thomas Fuller

Quotes.Health Quotes: Water is life, and clean water means health.
Quotes.Author: Audrey Hepburn

Quotes.Health Quotes: Hearty laughter is a good way to jog internally without having to go outdoors.
Quotes.Author: Norman Cousins

Quotes.Health Quotes: Successful weight loss takes programming, not willpower.
Quotes.Author: Phil McGraw

Quotes.Health Quotes: While weight loss is important, what's more important is the quality of food you put in your body - food is information that quickly changes your metabolism and genes.
Quotes.Author: Mark Hyman

Quotes.Health Quotes: The real pride, the real present, is your health and your longevity. My whole career, I have never done anything where competition was involved with weight loss.
Quotes.Author: Richard Simmons

Quotes.Health Quotes: Here's the secret to weight loss: It's all about crowding out, not cutting out.
Quotes.Author: Kathy Freston

Quotes.Health Quotes: Not having time or energy for weight loss makes no sense. Does it take more time or energy to eat fish than prime rib? No.
Quotes.Author: Martha Beck

Quotes.Health Quotes: There's no way to fake weight loss - you just kinda have to not eat.
Quotes.Author: Paula Malcomson

Quotes.Health Quotes: Only  you can change your life. No one can do it for you.
Quotes.Author: Carol Burnett

Quotes.Health Quotes: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
Quotes.Author: St. Jerome

Quotes.Health Quotes: It always seems impossible until it's done.
Quotes.Author: Nelson Mandela

Quotes.Health Quotes: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Quotes.Author: Confucius

Quotes.Health Quotes: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
Quotes.Author: Bo Jackson
